setName: Scroll of the Embered City's Hero

setEffects.2: When a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, the equipping character regenerates 6 Energy.
setEffects.4: When the equipping character triggers an Elemental Reaction involving their Elemental Type, all nearby party members of Elemental Types involved in that reaction gain 25% All Elemental and Physical DMG Bonus for 10s. When the equipping character is in Nightsoul's Blessing when triggering this, an additional 25% All Elemental and Physical DMG Bonus will be granted to characters for 20s. The above effect can be triggered even if the character is off-field. DMG Bonuses provided by Artifact Sets with the same name will not stack.
